chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
fact_prodSO : forall n : nat, INR (fact n) = prod_f_R0 (fun k : nat => if Nat.eq_dec k 0 then 1%R else INR k) n
List.Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {~ List.Forall P l}
eq_dim_dec : forall i k : dim, {i = k} + {i <> k}
List.Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {List.Exists P l} + {~ List.Exists P l}
dim_opp = fun k : dim => match k with | zero => one | one => zero end : dim -> dim
List.Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {List.Forall P l} + {List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
List.neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ List.Forall P l -> List.Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
empty_dec : forall m : fmap, {empty m} + {~ empty m}
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
eq_nat_decide : forall n m : nat, {eq_nat n m} + {~ eq_nat n m}
lt_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n < m)%nat} + {~ (n < m)%nat}
gt_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n > m)%nat} + {~ (n > m)%nat}
ftag = fix ftag (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : tag := match m with | V => 0%nat | I m0 x0 t0 _ => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then t0 else ftag m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => ftag m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> tag
fpoint = fix fpoint (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : point := match m with | V => (0%R, 0%R) | I m0 x0 _ p0 => if eq_dart_dec x0 x then p0 else fpoint m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => fpoint m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> point
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_rect : forall P : fmap -> Type, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_rec : forall P : fmap -> Set, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
Zlt_left : forall n m : Z, n < m -> 0 <= m + -1 + - n
Zge_left : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.MP.In_dec : forall (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt) (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t), {FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s} + {~ FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s}
Z.gt_lt_iff : forall n m : Z, n > m < -> m < n
Z.ge_le_iff : forall n m : Z, n >= m < -> m <= n
Znot_lt_ge : forall n m : Z, ~ n < m -> n >= m
Z.lt_nge : forall n m : Z, n < m < -> ~ m <= n
Z.lt_succ_r : forall n m : Z, n < Z.succ m < -> n <= m
Z.nle_gt : forall n m : Z, ~ n <= m < -> m < n
Z.lt_lt_succ_r : forall n m : Z, n < m -> n < Z.succ m
Z.lt_eq_cases : forall n m : Z, n <= m < -> n < m \/ n = m
not_Zeq_inf : forall n m : Z, n <> m -> {n < m} + {m < n}
not_eq_S : forall n m : nat, n <> m -> S n <> S m
Znumtheory.prime_dec_aux : forall p m : Z, {forall n : Z, 1 < n < m -> Znumtheory.rel_prime n p} + {exists n : Z, 1 < n < m /\ ~ Znumtheory.rel_prime n p}
SetoidList.InA_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), {SetoidList.InA eqA x l} + {~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l}
gt = fun n m : nat => (m < n)%nat : nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
OrderedTypeEx.Nat_as_OT.eq_dec : forall n m : nat, {n = m} + {n <> m}
eq_tag_dec : forall n m : nat, {n = m} + {n <> m}
Nat.eq_dec : forall n m : nat, {n = m} + {n <> m}
OrderedTypeEx.N_as_OT.eq_dec : forall n m : N, {n = m} + {n <> m}
N.eq_dec : forall n m : N, {n = m} + {n <> m}

```coq
intros m k x.
induction m using fmap_ind.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. destruct (exd_dec m0 x) as [H | H].
  + left. apply IHm. assumption.
  + right. apply IHm. assumption.
- simpl. destruct (eq_dim_dec k0 k) as [H | H].
  + destruct (eq_dart_dec x0 x) as [H0 | H0].
    * left. apply IHm. assumption.
    * right. apply IHm. assumption.
  + destruct (exd_dec m0 x) as [H1 | H1].
    * left. apply IHm. assumption.
    * right. apply IHm. assumption.
Qed.

original: intros m k x. induction m using fmap_ind. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct (exd_dec m0 x) as [H | H]. + left. apply IHm. auto. + right. apply IHm. auto. - simpl. destruct (eq_dim_dec k0 k) as [H | H]. + destruct (eq_dart_dec x0 x) as [H0 | H0]. * left. apply IHm. auto. * right. apply IHm. auto. + destruct (exd_dec m0 x) as [H1 | H1]. * left. apply IHm. auto. * right. apply IHm. auto.
